title: Straford video memories
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
abstract: Contents: Warrnambool and the west coast, November 1999 (13:07 mins)--Gone to blazes (12:27 mins)
description: Video memories of the Victorian west coast and bushfires in the north-east produced by the Straford family. "Gone to blazes" contains footage broadcast by national and commercial TV channels during the course of the devastating bushfires that ravaged the Victorian north-east early in 2003.
related_objects: Compilation title; B2000002; Inala Straford Home Movie Archive; Active; 15 Sep 2004
